results.name: Permutation of nonnegative integers: a(1) = 0, a(2) = 1, a(2n) = 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = 1 + 2*a(A269380(2n+1)).
comment: Note the indexing: Domain starts from 1, range from 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
xref: Differs from A243071 and A252756 for the first time at n=19, which here a(19) = 11, instead of 255.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 01 2016
